#text=I was looking in the mirror this morning and noticed my hair had gotten out of control .
#text=So I decided to get a hair cut .
#text=I was new to the area , so first I wanted to research all the available barber shops nearby .
#text=I found three different places , and all with great reviews .
#text=So I decided to go the closest one to my house .
#text=When I got there , I had to wait for the 4 people currently waiting before I arrived .
#text=I started looking at the posters on the wall and came up with some new ideas on what hair cut style I think would look best on me .
#text=When it was my turn I told the barber I wanted a buzz cut .
#text=He trimmed my hair low , then got a fine-edge razor to get my hairline .
#text=I walked out the barber shop feeling like a new man .
